text: The only thing httpd does if out of memory is log a message and then call abort(). Segfaulting on oom is not elegant, but it is not a real problem. I am not sure that this needs fixing. If yes, then probably by using a wrapper for malloc that calls abort_on_oom().

creator: max@cxib.net
text: i agree with you. mod_case_filter_in is a experimental module, so it would be nice to add abort_on_oom().
